name: Time Killers: Spot Race
description: Spot Race is a little simple pair based puzzle game, which can been played when you are short in time.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Most Intel and AMD cpu's, around 1ghz. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any OpenGL graphics Card DirectX: Version 7.1 Storage: 16 MB available space
